author: Patsy McGarry
title: Half of Dublin’s Catholic priests cocooned due to Covid-19 measures
description: Restrictions placing ‘great strain’ on clergy still in active ministry, archbishop says
content:
The coronavirus outbreak has led to almost half of Dublins Catholic priests being confined to their homes as they are aged over 70, Archbishop Diarmuid Martin has said.
The most recent figures showed that 413 priests and 22 deacons were serving in Dublin. Dr… [+1582 chars]
